summary: Persuasive business development professional, successful at establishing and maintaining key partnerships with corporate decision makers. Offering more than 12 years of successful corporate business development and operations experience. A top-performer with the entrepreneurial vision and leadership skills to drive business expansion. Proven skills in driving results, product development, project management, account management and problem solving. Successful at leading large scale commercialization of new platform and innovation initiatives for highly visible capital projects. Recognized for leading teams to exceed results in fast paced, high growth business environments. Committed to healthy eating, healthy living and a healthy planet. Bilingual.

experience.title: Associate Director Business Development
experience.description: Led commercialization effort for the largest platform innovation program and the largest strategic partnership in Kraft Foods history with over $25MM capital investment across multiple countries. Directed team engagement, established strategic meetings, tracked timelines and costs, and facilitated mitigation/contingency planning and executive communications.

experience.title: Operations Supervisor
experience.description: Co-led the largest new product initiative in Kraft Foods. Delivered $140MM GR in Year 1. Led in-store merchandising initiatives, developed consumer response plans for social media/CRM, and created launch activities including pricing trackers and performance dashboards. Managed analytics, forecasts, contracts, and budgets for two brands with a combined GR of $150MM. Implemented major packaging changes and established lean, FIFO warehouse practices; supervised over 30 union employees across multiple lines.

experience.title: Project Engineer
experience.description: Participated in identification, planning, and execution of design projects. Used MicroStation and AutoCAD. Prepared final project reports to FDOT standards; integrated marketing campaigns and customer-specific actions as part of project scope.

experience.title: Integrated Marketing Campaign
experience.description: Led execution of the Instant Yuban blend reformulation targeting Hispanic consumers in the West region. Created the campaign brief in collaboration with the agency, incorporating new consumer learnings. Managed packaging redesign, promotional items, in-store tactics, and sales support; drove IMC initiatives across top retailers.

education.school: University of North Florida, Coggin School of Business

education.degree: Bachelor of Science: Production Engineering - Continuous Improvement and Management

certifications: OLA (Organization Latinos at KFT) Certified Recruiter
Anthony Robbins, Life and Wealth Mastery University Graduate
Color Analyst - Fashion Institute of Technology, NYC
